name: sync_project_board
description: Parse a Markdown planning document and sync tasks to GitHub Issues. Extracts '### TASK: [Title]' sections from the file and creates corresponding GitHub issues. Skips tasks that already have issues. Use dry_run=true to preview without creating issues. This tool is primarily for the SABINE_ARCHITECT role to manage the project backlog.

file_path.description: Path to the Markdown file to parse (relative to project root). Default: 'docs/roles/SABINE_ARCHITECT.md'

dry_run.description: If true, preview what issues would be created without actually creating them. Default: false

owner.description: GitHub repository owner. Default: uses GITHUB_OWNER env or 'strugcity'

repo.description: GitHub repository name. Default: uses GITHUB_REPO env or 'sabine-super-agent'
